name: Goki-Online
description:
Move mouse: rotate left and right

Left mouse click: Move forward

Right mouse click: Change formation of cockroaches

・Phalanx: Side attack formation. Deploy to the left and right.

・Assualt: Vertical attack formation. Deploy forward.

・Tesutudo: Defensive formation. Deploy around yourself.

・Ambush: Make it stand by on the spot.

1-9: Emotions can be displayed. It can be seen by others. It has nothing to do with the game, so if you can afford it, try it!

【Score】

When you hit a cockroach, you become a companion. Score when you make friends, high score when you defeat others

【Configuration】

You can set the image quality etc. from the title setting. For heavy people, lower the image quality, reduce the gloss, lower the FPS, etc.

【Introduction 】

It is an intrusive multi-online battle game where you play in 3 minutes! You can play alone with NPC opponents Capture cockroaches and play against others, which will increase over time! If you hit the body, you will have more friends!
